tr.td: A VC designed to convey a "Health Card" (i.e., clinical data bound to a subject's identity)
A Health Card designed to convey COVID-19 details
A Health Card designed to convey monkeypox details
A Health Card designed to convey immunization details
A Health Card designed to convey laboratory results

description.value: A code system defining various credential types for SMART Health Cards
